title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Rivian: Modernize mission-critical manufacturing applications with AWS (HMC217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Rivian：借助 AWS 实现关键任务制造应用的现代化 (HMC217)
abstract: Manufacturing applications like Ignition, SCADA, MES, and robotic control require low-latency connectivity to on-premises manufacturing equipment. Join this session to discover how Rivian, a cloud-first automotive manufacturer, is modernizing mission-critical and latency-sensitive manufacturing applications with AWS Outposts. Learn how to design and architect critical on-premises applications for high availability and disaster recovery while maintaining low-latency edge performance and analytics.
abstract_cn: 像 Ignition、SCADA、MES 和机器人控制等制造应用需要与本地制造设备进行低延迟连接。加入本次会议,了解云优先的汽车制造商 Rivian 如何使用 AWS Outposts 实现关键任务和延迟敏感型制造应用的现代化。学习如何为关键本地应用设计和架构高可用性和灾难恢复方案,同时保持低延迟边缘性能和分析能力。
